0.text: Innate: Rakan periodically generates a 33 − 254 (based on level) (+ 90% AP)  shield that lasts until broken. If the shield is damaged but not destroyed, after being out of combat for 5 seconds it will be restored to maximum value.

1.text: Basic attacks and abilities reduce Fey Feathers'  cooldown by 1 second for each enemy  champion hit.

2.text: Innate - Lover's Leap: If either Rakan or  Xayah is channeling  Recall, the other may move nearby and channel their own to join alongside them. Both reach base at the time of which the initiator's  Recall completes.

0.text: Active: Rakan slings an enchanted feather in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit.

1.text: If the target was an enemy  champion or epic  monster, an area is marked around Rakan.

2.text: After 3 seconds or if an ally champion enters within the marked area, Rakan  heals himself and surrounding allied champions for 18 − 120 (based on level) (+ 70% AP).

0.text: Active: Rakan  dashes to the target location.

1.text: After a 0.35-second delay upon arrival, he leaps into the air, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocking them up for 1 second.

2.text: Rakan will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing crowd control during Grand Entrance.

3.text: Grand Entrance will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Rakan  shields the target allied champion for 3 seconds and then  dashes to and around them. Battle Dance can be recast within 5 seconds at no additional cost.

1.text: Recast: Rakan mimics the first cast's effects.

2.text: Rakan will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing crowd control during Battle Dance.

3.text: If  Xayah is the target, Battle Dance can be cast from an increased range.

0.text: Active: Rakan breaks into a captivating sprint for 4 seconds, gaining  75% bonus movement speed and becoming  ghosted for the duration.

1.text: While The Quickness is active, Rakan also deals magic damage to all enemies he comes into contact with and  charms them for a duration, during which they are  slowed by 75%. This cannot affect the same enemy more than once. Colliding with an enemy  champion increases The Quickness'  duration by 0.25 seconds. This may only occur once per champion.

2.text: When Rakan collides with his first enemy  champion, he gains an additional  75% bonus movement speed, which starts decaying after 0.5 seconds by 20% every 0.5 seconds and then by 15% after decaying by 60% over 1.5 seconds.

3.text: During the first 0.5 seconds of The Quickness, Rakan is in cast time.

4.text: During The Quickness, Rakan cannot basic attack enemy champions if he did not collide with them, unless the attack command was inputted before the ability was activated.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Rakan slings an enchanted feather in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit.
Active: Rakan  shields the target allied champion for 3 seconds and then  dashes to and around them. Battle Dance can be recast within 5 seconds at no additional cost.

0.concerningText: Active: Rakan slings an enchanted feather in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit.
Active: Rakan  shields the target allied champion for 3 seconds and then  dashes to and around them. Battle Dance can be recast within 5 seconds at no additional cost.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+5 ability power
+30 health
+25% base health regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Targon's Buckler, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks  execute minions below ( 50% /  30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill  gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Conduit: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CONDUIT: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Convergence: Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies deal 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONVERGENCE:  Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies deal 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Intervention: You reveal the target area for 3 seconds. After a 2.5 second delay, a beam of light strikes the ground. Allies within the area are healed for 180 − 360 (based on target's level), while enemy champions take 10% of target's maximum health as true damage. Can be used while dead. (120 second cooldown; 5500 range).

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Pledge: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – PLEDGE: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is nearby, redirect 15% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage (stops if you are below 30% of your maximum health). Additionally, if they are below 50% of their maximum health, gain 35% bonus movement speed while moving towards them.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SACRIFICE: While your Worthy ally is nearby, redirect 15% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as  true damage (stops if you are below 30% of your maximum health).
